extension:module.title: Youmax 1.0
extension:module.description: jQuery plugin Show complete Youtube channel on your website using the Youmax plugin
extension:module.author: Stanley Ojadovwa

setting.title: Playlist Url to show in the featured Tab
setting.description: Optionally you may specify a playlist on youtube channel to display in the featured tab (Ex: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZnxqowr6IKidF63-ybswuiO074g366-Y). If this is not supplied the latest playlist is displayed in the featured tab as the featured playlist.

setting.title: Default Tab
setting.description: This lets you choose the tab that will be selected by default. You may set its value to "uploads" or "playlists" or "featured" and the appropriate tab will be auto-selected.
